channel.title: Draft Not Selected in Drafts List When Using x-callback-url/open
channel.description:
When opening a draft by its `uuid` using `x-callback-url` in macOS:
```bash drafts5://x-callback-url/open?uuid=[UUID] ```
Drafts correctly displays the Draft, however the UI does not show the draft as selected in the Drafts List sidebar.
Expected behaviour: In addition to displaying the draft in the editor, the draft list sidebar UI would update to show the draft as selected.
